abstract: Faced by difficult market conditions, the British oil giant is to spend $1 billion on restructuring, a move that could eliminate thousands of jobs.
snippet: Faced by difficult market conditions, the British oil giant is to spend $1 billion on restructuring, a move that could eliminate thousands of jobs.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — As oil prices continued to fall, the British oil giant BP said on Wednesday that it would cut jobs and take $1 billion in restructuring charges over the next five quarters.

headline.main: BP to Cut Jobs as Price of Oil Falls
headline.print_headline: BP to Cut Jobs as Price of Oil Falls
